paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our team has extensive expertise and a track record of success in various legal matters.

detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: We prioritize our clients' needs, providing personalized assistance and dedicated advocacy.

detailsData.title: Trial Tested Advocates
detailsData.content: Our attorneys are zealous advocates for our clients' rights, with a focus on achieving optimal outcomes.

valueProp: ACTS LAW, LLP is a dedicated legal firm committed to providing exceptional advocacy and representation for our clients in a wide range of legal matters.

testimonalData.text: ACTS LAW under promised and over performed for me. I was surprised with my attorney's team and their ability to keep me informed while assisting me with all my needs.
testimonalData.author: Cara Barton

testimonalData.text: I can't thank Maryel, Jennie and the rest of the ACTS LAW team enough in everything they did to help me out. They were always so communicative with me, updating and keeping me in the loop of the whole process.
testimonalData.author: Rebecca Latorre

testimonalData.text: In my 35 plus years of business experience, I have never met more knowledgeable, responsive professionals. My cases were settled in record time with extremely satisfactory results.
testimonalData.author: Jacob Gurevich
